amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for salaries, expenses, and general legal activities of the DOJ by $1 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Legal activities of the U.S. Parole Commission by $1 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 198 (Roll no. 273).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 198 (Roll no. 273).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Gosar.
